actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

official_title: A bill to establish certain limitations on the approval of hydropower projects at Lake Tobesofkee in Bibb County, Georgia.

summary.text: Prohibits the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission from issuing any permit, license, or exemption to any public or private entity relating to any hydroelectric power project located at Lake Tobesofkee in Bibb County, Georgia, without having obtained the prior consent of the governing body of Bibb County.

titles.title: A bill to establish certain limitations on the approval of hydropower projects at Lake Tobesofkee in Bibb County, Georgia.
